price: 32. Dan Kami menjadikan langit sebagai atap yang terpelihara, namun mereka tetap berpaling dari tanda-tanda (kebesaran Allah) itu (matahari, bulan, angin, awan, dan lain-lain).
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā al-samāa saqfan maḥfūẓan wahum ʿan āyātihā muʿ'riḍūna
